lead_paragraph: PAVESE--Zachary. Zachary Ezbiansky Pavese, died June 29, 2016 at New York University Hospital. Zachary had just started treatment for leukemia and due to his weakened immune system was hospitalized in critical condition for septic shock on June 22, 2016. He died peacefully by his mother and father's side eight days later. Zachary is survived by his twin brothers Abraham Jonesy, Jacob Odo, his mother, Karin Ezbiansky, and his father, Marc. Service information is available online at http://goo.gl/qMDdVG. If anyone is interested in making a donation in Zachary's memory, please contribute to the cancer organization of your choice. 1/3
